body: @Sgt. Morningwood Sometimes there are those "pseudo NTRs" where a Heroine or FMC of an anime, manga...etc. gets fucked by a non-mc. And they call it NTR because the she is the MCs love interest or lover. Example: Sakura from Naruto gets fucked by Naruto or Some Ninja. This is NTR because Sakura is the lover of Sasuke.
Is this one of those "rando fucks FMC" NTR?
